title: BUG: A file created in the user home folder using a windows (vsc) tools is not visible, and if I create from WSL sometime dissapears
body: I'm running Node from WSL (because I'm running it on a Ubuntu host in production) but would like to edit the files in VSC. In the user home folder C:\Users\<username>AppData\Local\lxss\home\<username>

comments.body: Looks like a dupe like you noted, I think the two issues are part of the same problem — even if the results are slightly different. Windows can see files linux creates, linux cannot see the files windows creates — which, in turn, when you use an ide/editor from windows to create something, causes issues.
